column5: Just two weeks later, like a weird dream.. I walked down the river to where a salmon managed to drag me down a hill and into the creek last week, lol.. and there is a big dark fish sitting in the same spot. At first I thought it was the same salmon from last week. He was darting from side to side at the back of the pool agressively feeding on chub minnows. I bombed my #5 Blue Fox at him once, twice, and the third time my reel backlashed a little. Spinner dropped to bottom, and he came from 4 feet back and CRUSHED it, right on bottom! Fish on, whoa, this is no half dead boot. In the jam at the back of the pool for a good while but eventually he came out and laid in the net for me. My new PB brown.
Nice.  My son is sitting beside me. When told that it was a brown trout he says: "It's not brown. It's the colour of a pickle. It should be called a pickle trout."  What can you do?
What a big ugly brute!  Awesome story and great fish man!
Sweet brown Rich!  I love those giant kypes!
Impressive man!  I gotta try me hands at the grand sometime.
Beauty Rich,bet it was more fun than your saying  .
Sweet brown Rich!  I love those giant kypes!  x2  Sweet fish Rich.
Nice catch, and you learned a new pattern for catching them too. Who would have thought a Mepps laying on the bottom of the river would bring in the big one.
nice pickle trout
Atta boy Rich!  So much for the WGSF now.....
Awesome fish, what a tank! Well done sir
An excellent broonie Rich.
Wow, nice one Rich, look at that hook!!!
Nice one for sure !!!!! Another crushed PB !!!! Tight-lines
One heck of a pickle trout.   As if it hit hardware on bottom like that

Thanks everybody! I was much more excited in person than this post made it sound, lol  And yeah, odd thing is it's not the first time it's happened to me. It's becoming a running joke now if I get backlash and my spinner sinks to set the hook cuz there's a fish on. Hahaha
one of the largest browns i'm aware of, caught by board member Miller, was caught after he let his spoon fall to bottom.  a 20lbs brown slurped up the chunk of steel off bottom.
Nice fish Rich!  WR
Best Pickle Trout EVER!
thats a beauty, thanks for sharing that story ..
Nice one Rich...WOW !!!
